TopicTitle: Why Can't I Post Attachments? (Sorry if It's the wrong forum)

Articles.Content: Do I need to get to a certain post count? If not, what do I need to do in order to post attachments?
I don't think attachments work here at all. Best you can do is host it somewhere else and link here.

I believe they disabled attachments for security reasons.

I am also not capable of posting attachments.

The attachments system came with the software, but proved to be a security liability, and so was disabled. External services like Mediafire and Imgur provide links you can insert into your posts here. Also, moved to Kerbal Network.
